name: X 'em Up
description:
In this game you don't want to beat 'em up. You want them to beat themselves up!

Controls:

WASD: Movement
Shift: Dodge
Spacebar+WASD: Parry (Redirects enemy attack to a direction)
Alt+F4: Close Game (SORRY OUT OF TIME)

Watch the gameplay video if you're having trouble staying alive for more than a few seconds.
